resources.string: Stai utilizzando l\'ultimo ritrovato in materia di rispetto della tua privacy.
Sorry but you are using not allowed characters
Verify the state of your Internet connection!
No bus is supposed to arrive at this stop
Seems that no bus stop have this name
Bus stop is now in your favorites
Press on a bus stop name to populate this list

Tap the bus stop name to add it to the favourites

How to read timelines:
 12:56* Real time arrival
 12:56 Scheduled time of arrival

Pull down to refresh the timetable

Welcome!

Thanks for using BusTO, an indipendent app useful to move around Torino using a Free/Libre software.

Why using this app?

- You\'ll never be tracked
- You\'ll never see boring ads
- We\'ll always respect your privacy
- Moreover, it\'s lightweight!

How does it work?

This app will show you the timetable of the buses using the information published on the site www.5t.torino.it.

Who worked on BusTO:
- Valerio Bozzolan, the main developer.
- Marco Gagino, the main contributor + icon.
- Paolo Alloatti, the original concept of the icon.
- JSoup for the web scraper library.
- makovkastar for the floating buttons.
- Google for Material Design icons.
Thanks to all the contributors!

Licenses

The app and the related source code are released by Valerio Bozzolan under the terms of the Gnu General Public License v3+ (GNU GPLv3+). So everyone is allowed to use, to study, to improve and to share this app by any kind of means and for any purpose: under the conditions of manteining this rights and of attributing the original source code to Valerio Bozzolan.

Notes

This app has been developed hoping to be useful to everyone but without any warranty.

Send bugs/ideas: bug tracker.

Source code: lp:bus-torino.

Changes: changes.txt

Meet the author: Valerio Bozzolan.

This translation is kindly provided by Riccardo Caniato and Marco Gagino.
